code: import React from'react';import Product from'./Product';const ProductItem=({product,onAddToCartClicked})=>React.createElement("div",{style:{marginBottom:20}},React.createElement(Product,{title:product.title,price:product.price,quantity:product.inventory}),React.createElement("button",{onClick:onAddToCartClicked,disabled:product.inventory>0?'':'disabled'},product.inventory>0?'Add to cart':'Sold Out'));export default ProductItem;
